description: Analyzes competitor or critic blog posts, articles, and content to identify key arguments, weaknesses, and opportunities, then generates strategic professional response content that counters criticism and reinforces your brand position

example_response.competitor_summary: Brief summary of who the competitor/critic is and what their content is about
example_response.threat_level: Assessment of how much impact this content could have: Low, Medium, High, or Critical
example_response.recommended_response_type: Recommended type of response: Blog Post, Social Media Thread, Press Statement, Detailed Rebuttal, Thought Leadership Piece, or No Response Needed
example_response.response_content: Complete ready-to-publish response content with markdown formatting
example_response.tone_guidance: Guidance on the overall tone and approach for the response
